Structs/Version.html#/s:vV7libsane7Versi.name: description
Structs/Version.html#/s:vV7libsane7Versi.abstract: Display the version as a version string

Structs/Parameters/FrameFormat.html.name: FrameFormat
Structs/Parameters/FrameFormat.html.abstract: The format in which an image frame can be encoded

Structs/Parameters.html#/s:vV7libsane10P.name: format
Structs/Parameters.html#/s:vV7libsane10P.abstract: The format of the next frame to be returned

Structs/Parameters.html#/s:vV7libsane10P.name: lastFrame
Structs/Parameters.html#/s:vV7libsane10P.abstract: Indicates if the current frame or the next to be acquired is the last frame of a multi-frame image

Structs/Parameters.html#/s:vV7libsane10P.name: lines
Structs/Parameters.html#/s:vV7libsane10P.abstract: The number of lines which an image consists of (can be unknown)

Structs/Parameters.html#/s:vV7libsane10P.name: bytesPerLine
Structs/Parameters.html#/s:vV7libsane10P.abstract: How many bytes make up a line

Structs/Parameters.html#/s:vV7libsane10P.name: pixelsPerLine
Structs/Parameters.html#/s:vV7libsane10P.abstract: How many pixels make up a line

Structs/Parameters.html#/s:vV7libsane10P.name: bytesTotal
Structs/Parameters.html#/s:vV7libsane10P.abstract: The total number of bytes, is nil if lines is nil

Structs/Parameters.html#/s:vV7libsane10P.name: bytesPerSample
Structs/Parameters.html#/s:vV7libsane10P.abstract: Number of bytes per sample, taking care of depth not being 8 or 16

Structs/Parameters.html.name: Parameters
Structs/Parameters.html.abstract: This struct contains scan parameters. These are used to interpret scan data properly.

Structs/Version.html.name: Version
Structs/Version.html.abstract: This represents the version returned by the SANE api. It consists of major, minor and build number.
